rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:25 PM, 08 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Bulacan, Quezon, Rizal, Metro Manila and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(Santa Rosa, San Leonardo, Jaen, Penaranda), Tarlac(Capas, Bamban) and Zambales(Botolan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
